models.name: Gemini 3 pro
models.subtitle: Latest SOTA model from Google - DeepMind
models.description: Most capable Gemini model with a 1M context window; ideal for complex reasoning, long-document analysis, and multimodal tasks. Offers balanced speed and accuracy for enterprise applications.

models.name: Gemini 3.0 Flash
models.subtitle: Near 3.0 pro performance at a fraction of the cost
models.description: Low-latency, cost-efficient variant that offers strong performance for real-time applications and high-volume inference. Optimized for speed without significant quality trade-offs.

models.name: Gemini 2.5 pro
models.subtitle: Balanced performance and affordability
models.description: Reliable mid-tier Gemini with strong reasoning and generation at a moderate cost; suitable for production workloads requiring consistent quality and reasonable latency.

models.name: Gemini 2.5 Flash
models.subtitle: Cost-effective fast responses
models.description: Optimized for quick responses and simple tasks; great for chatbots, classification, and lightweight inference. Provides the best cost-to-speed ratio in the Gemini lineup.

models.name: GPT 4.1
models.subtitle: OpenAI's advanced reasoning model
models.description: High-performing GPT variant with enhanced reasoning capabilities; excels at coding, complex analysis, and technical tasks. Offers improved accuracy over previous versions with moderate inference speed.

models.name: GPT 4o (ChatGPT 4o)
models.subtitle: Fast and capable general-purpose model
models.description: Balanced model with strong speed and general-purpose capabilities; optimized for real-time interactions with broad competence across domains. Features improved multimodal understanding.

models.name: Grok 3
models.subtitle: xAI's advanced model with massive context
models.description: High-context model (512K) suited for very large documents, deep context reasoning, and research-oriented tasks. Offers strong mathematical and scientific capabilities with comprehensive analysis.

models.name: Grok 3 mini
models.subtitle: Lightweight and affordable Grok variant
models.description: Compact Grok model with a 64K context window; ideal for budget-conscious deployments and moderate-complexity tasks. Provides good performance for conversational applications and basic reasoning.

models.name: Grok 4 fast
models.subtitle: Blazingly fast Grok 4 model
models.description: Optimized for speed and efficiency; Grok 4 fast provides rapid responses for high-volume tasks while maintaining strong reasoning capabilities. Features an expansive 2M context window for massive document processing.

models.name: Claude 3.7 Sonnet
models.subtitle: Anthropic's balanced intelligence model
models.description: Versatile Sonnet model offering the ideal balance of intelligence, speed, and cost. Excels at complex reasoning, coding, and creative tasks while maintaining strong safety alignment and reliability.

models.name: Claude 4.0 Sonnet
models.subtitle: Next-generation intelligence from Anthropic
models.description: Advanced Sonnet model with significant improvements in reasoning, coding, and creative capabilities. Features enhanced safety measures, better instruction following, and superior long-context understanding with expanded 400K window.
